qFallbackTitle.desc:
Corresponds to the label of the measure.
If the label is not defined then the measure name is used.

qApprMaxGlyphCount.desc: Length of the longest value in the field.

qSortIndicator.desc:
Sort indicator.
This parameter is optional. The default value is no sorting.

qNumFormat.desc:
Format of the field.

This parameter is optional.

qIsAutoFormat.desc: This parameter is set to true if qNumFormat is set to U (unknown). The engine guesses the type of the field based on the field's expression.

qError.desc:
This parameter is optional.
Gives information on the error.

qReverseSort.desc: If set to true, it inverts the sort criteria in the field.
